title: Separate bins shall be provided for safe disposal of hazardous waste (batteries, e-waste, lamps, medical waste, etc
clause_text: Separate bins shall be provided for safe disposal of hazardous waste (batteries, e-waste, lamps, medical waste, etc.) as provided in hazardous waste management guidelines prescribed by the Ministry of Environment and Forest (MoEF), Government of India.
